trans-unit.source: How to use contacts and calendar info in your UWP app.
trans-unit.target: How to use contacts and calendar info in your UWP app.

trans-unit.source: Contacts and calendar
trans-unit.target: Contacts and calendar

trans-unit.source: Contacts and calendar
trans-unit.target: Contacts and calendar

trans-unit.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)

trans-unit.source: You can let your users access their contacts and appointments so they can share content, email, calendar info, or messages with each other, or whatever functionality you design.
trans-unit.target: You can let your users access their contacts and appointments so they can share content, email, calendar info, or messages with each other, or whatever functionality you design.

trans-unit.source: To see a few different ways in which your app can access contacts and appointments, see these topics:
trans-unit.target: To see a few different ways in which your app can access contacts and appointments, see these topics:

trans-unit.source: Topic
trans-unit.target: Topic

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Select contacts
trans-unit.target: Select contacts

trans-unit.source: Through the [Windows.ApplicationModel.Contacts](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/BR225002) namespace, you have several options for selecting contacts.
trans-unit.target: Through the [Windows.ApplicationModel.Contacts](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/BR225002) namespace, you have several options for selecting contacts.

trans-unit.source: Here, we'll show you how to select a single contact or multiple contacts, and we'll show you how to configure the contact picker to retrieve only the contact information that your app needs.
trans-unit.target: Here, we'll show you how to select a single contact or multiple contacts, and we'll show you how to configure the contact picker to retrieve only the contact information that your app needs.

trans-unit.source: Send email
trans-unit.target: Send email

trans-unit.source: Shows how to launch the compose email dialog to allow the user to send an email message.
trans-unit.target: Shows how to launch the compose email dialog to allow the user to send an email message.

trans-unit.source: You can pre-populate the fields of the email with data before showing the dialog.
trans-unit.target: You can pre-populate the fields of the email with data before showing the dialog.

trans-unit.source: The message will not be sent until the user taps the send button.
trans-unit.target: The message will not be sent until the user taps the send button.

trans-unit.source: Send an SMS message
trans-unit.target: Send an SMS message

trans-unit.source: This topic shows you how to launch the compose SMS dialog to allow the user to send an SMS message.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows you how to launch the compose SMS dialog to allow the user to send an SMS message.

trans-unit.source: You can pre-populate the fields of the SMS with data before showing the dialog.
trans-unit.target: You can pre-populate the fields of the SMS with data before showing the dialog.

trans-unit.source: The message will not be sent until the user taps the send button.
trans-unit.target: The message will not be sent until the user taps the send button.

trans-unit.source: Manage appointments
trans-unit.target: Manage appointments

trans-unit.source: Through the [Windows.ApplicationModel.Appointments](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn263359) namespace, you can create and manage appointments in a user's calendar app.
trans-unit.target: Through the [Windows.ApplicationModel.Appointments](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn263359) namespace, you can create and manage appointments in a user's calendar app.

trans-unit.source: Here, we'll show you how to create an appointment, add it to a calendar app, replace it in the calendar app, and remove it from the calendar app.
trans-unit.target: Here, we'll show you how to create an appointment, add it to a calendar app, replace it in the calendar app, and remove it from the calendar app.

trans-unit.source: We'll also show how to display a time span for a calendar app and create an appointment-recurrence object.
trans-unit.target: We'll also show how to display a time span for a calendar app and create an appointment-recurrence object.

trans-unit.target: Related topics
